channel.title: Help with text
channel.description: I'm trying to figure out how to change the colour of text in the chatbox, not onscreen. Could anyone help?

item.title: Help with text
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Okay, for the text in the chatbox edit this line (Client.java)

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aStringArray944[k], i1, 822, j1);

255 Is the color code for blue(Just use hexadecimal codes)
Ex. 0xFF0000 for red.

Than find

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aString887 + "*", 90, 822, 6 + class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method383(anInt1116, s + ": "));

The 255 once again is for blue, edit it for a different color.

Here is an example of the outcome.

Read full topic
